text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria speciosa is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to French Polynesia.
text.Sources: Florence, J. (1998). "Psychotria speciosa". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38974A10154880. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38974A10154880.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
